channel.title: EAGLE on Savo's Site
channel.description: Recent content in EAGLE on Savo's Site

item.title: Scoreboard
item.description: Made a small display board to keep score of a game

item.title: gameBOI
item.description: A small handheld capable of offering several user selectable games to be played using the two buttons and 32 LEDs that form a display. Created in under two weeks!

item.title: TITAN V1
item.description: My first attempt at building a ‘steer by video’ system from scratch for one of our speed bikes

item.title: Zephyr
item.description: Designed the electronics system for Zephy, HPVDT’s entry to ASME 2019

item.title: Arbiter Lighting
item.description: Prepared a hardware-only lighting system based on what was planned for the team’s previous vehicle, Tempest. My first PCB!

item.title: Entry Fob Replication
item.description: Reverse engineered and replicated an access fob for my residence at the time
